QuestData.Title: In Darkness, Found
QuestData.Description:
Cartel Ve has a reputation for creeping around dangerous places in search of treasure. If they had any sense, they would leave the acquisition and sale of goods to the Xy. Alas.
One Ve member disappeared into Torghast with a plundered box of powerful items that he assumed would help him explore in safety. Madness!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Ve'nish in Torghast, Tower of the Damned.
